document.full_text: barnes & noble inc unveiled a new e-reader on tuesday that features a touch screen, weighs less than a paperback book and has a battery life of two months -- features designed to help it compete with amazon.com inc and apple inc.
document.title: barnes & noble debuts touchscreen e-reader
lines_and_colors: barnes & noble inc unveiled a new e-reader on tuesday that features a touch screen, weighs less than a paperback book and has a battery life of two months -- features designed to help it compete with amazon.com inc and apple inc.
